name: stays_auto_complete
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking_com_v2.
Tool description: Real-time data, unofficial API Booking.com
This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities.. from many hotels around the world to create a travel
API description: Fetches auto-complete suggestions for stays based on a given location.

location.description: The location for which to get auto-complete suggestions.

language_code.description: The language code for the results. Defaults to 'en-us'.
